game.name: Sleepy Cat
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 신비로운 잠자는 고양이로 변신해 환상의 칠요 세계에서 뜨거운 모험을 펼치세요. 미지의 영역을 탐험하고, 강력한 적과 싸우며, 잠든 힘을 깨워보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become the mysterious Sleepy Cat and embark on a thrilling adventure through the magical world of Septora — explore the unknown, battle fierce enemies, and awaken your hidden power.
